metadata.title: CVE-2022-24439 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: All versions of package gitpython are vulnerable to Remote Code Execution(RCE) due to improper user input validation, which makes it possible toinject a maliciously crafted remote URL into the clone command. Exploitingthis vulnerability is possible because the library makes external calls togit without sufficient sanitization of input arguments.

criterions.comment: python-git package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
